title: Payments
description: Own end-to-end software development cycle including building new payment platforms, and designing, implementing and delivering integrated payments solutions into existing infrastructure.

title: E-Commerce
description: Develop end-to-end e-commerce architecture from product & pricing management, multi-currency payments and multi-language interfaces to inventory management and shipping, with consideration to user experience, security, performance, and browser-compatibility.

title: Inventory
description: Analyse, design and implement complex software solutions for inventory management using a customer-focused, lightweight agile approach. This includes capacity management, on-demand (virtual) inventory, and integration with third-party vendor systems.

title: APIs
description: Building evergreen and scalable APIs for high-availability products, taking into consideration security, internationalisation. This includes multi-currency e-wallets, inventory management, booking & payment systems, pricing systems and check-out flow.

title: SaaS
description: Develop, test and implement robust multi-tenancy Software as a Service (SaaS) architecture for e-commerce, with customisation and full POS integration for each partner/client.

title: Microservices
description: Well-versed in applications under this architecture with event-driven design to maintain optimal communication using Kafka, gRPC and protocol buffers, for payment enterprise applications
